atk-s0201a1:370_4: taṁ dassetvā tesaṁ āsavānaṁ pahānaṁ dassetuṁ pubbe vā ayoniso manasikaroto puthujjanassa tesaṁ uppattiṁ
atk-s0201a1:370_5: dassetvā idāni tabbiparītassa pahānaṁ dassetuṁ sutavā ca kho,
atk-s0201a1:371_2: tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca vuttapaccanīkato ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:371_3: Paccanīkato ca sabbākārena ariyadhammassa akovidāvinītapaccanīkato ayaṁ “sutavā ariyasāvako ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:371_4: Apica kho sikhāpattavipassanato pabhuti yāva gotrabhu,
atk-s0201a1:371_5: tāva tadanurūpena atthena ayaṁ ariyasāvakoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:372_1: “So idaṁ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādīsu pana ayaṁ atthavibhāvanā,
atk-s0201a1:372_2: so catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko ariyasāvako taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:372_5: nirodhasampāpako maggoti evaṁ pubbeva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṁ
atk-s0201a1:372_6: samāruḷho samāno te tebhūmake khandhe idaṁ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a1:372_7: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a1:372_10: Yā panāyaṁ tasseva dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā pabhāvikā taṇhā,
atk-s0201a1:372_12: Yasmā pana dukkhañca samudayo ca idaṁ ṭhānaṁ patvā nirujjhanti nappavattanti,
atk-s0201a1:372_15: Nirodhasampāpakaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a1:372_16: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a1:373_4: āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena sakasantatiyaṁ cattāri bhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā ayaṁ rūpakkhandhoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a1:373_5: Taṁ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasike dhamme ime cattāro arūpakkhandhāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a1:373_7: Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgāyeva honti.
atk-s0201a1:373_9: Tassa ayaṁ hetu ayaṁ paccayoti avijjābhavataṇhākammāhārādike hetupaccaye vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a1:373_10: Tato tesaṁ paccayānañca paccayuppannadhammānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ vavatthapetvā ime dhammā ahutvā hontīti aniccalakkhaṇaṁ āropeti,
atk-s0201a1:373_13: Evaṁ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā paṭipāṭiyā vipassanaṁ pavattento sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a1:374_0: Tasmiṁ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0201a1:374_10: sesāni kiccato paṭivijjhati ceva abhisameti ca.
atk-s0201a1:374_11: Na hissa tasmiṁ samaye evaṁ hoti –
atk-s0201a1:374_14: Apica khvassa ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭivedhavasena nirodhaṁ sacchikaroto evaṁ taṁ ñāṇaṁ dukkhapariññākiccampi
atk-s0201a1:374_16: Tassevaṁ upāyena yoniso manasikaroto tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a1:374_19: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti sīlabbatānaṁ parāmasanato sīlabbataparāmāsoti.
atk-s0201a1:374_20: Tattha catūsu āsavesu sakkāyadiṭṭhisīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhāsavena saṅgahitattā āsavā ceva saṁyojanā ca.
atk-s0201a1:374_22: “Dassanā pahātabbā āsavā”ti ettha pariyāpannattā pana āsavāti.
atk-s0201a1:375_1: pahātabbā”ti ime sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo dassanā pahātabbā nāma āsavāti dassento āha.
atk-s0201a1:375_2: Atha vā yā ayaṁ channaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti evaṁ sarūpeneva sakkāyadiṭṭhi vibhattā.
atk-s0201a1:375_5: Sā ca yasmā sahajātapahānekaṭṭhehi saddhiṁ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a1:375_6: Diṭṭhāsave hi pahīyamāne taṁsahajāto catūsu diṭṭhisampayuttacittesu kāmāsavopi avijjāsavopi pahīyati.
atk-s0201a1:375_7: Pahānekaṭṭho pana catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu nāgasupaṇṇādisamiddhipatthanāvasena uppajjamāno bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a1:375_10: tathā vicikicchācittasampayutto avijjāsavopīti evaṁ sabbathāpi avasesā tayopi āsavā pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a1:375_11: Tasmā bahuvacananiddeso katoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:376_6: Disvā kattabbakiccaṁ pana na karoti saṁyojanānaṁ appahānato.
atk-s0201a1:376_8: Yattha katthaci rājānaṁ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṁ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā “ajjāpi rājānaṁ na passāmī”ti vadanto gāmavāsī puriso cettha nidassanaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:379_1: Evaṁ dassanena pahātabbe āsave dassetvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhe saṁvarā pahātabbe dassetuṁ,
atk-s0201a1:380_0: Nanu ca dassanena bhāvanāyāti imehi dvīhi appahātabbo āsavo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a1:380_1: atha kasmā visuṁ saṁvarādīhi pahātabbe dassetīti.
atk-s0201a1:380_2: Saṁvarādīhi pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā āsavā catūhi maggehi samugghātaṁ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a1:380_3: tasmā tesaṁ maggānaṁ pubbabhāge imehi pañcahākārehi vikkhambhanappahānaṁ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a1:380_4: Tasmā yo cāyaṁ vutto paṭhamo dassanamaggoyeva,
atk-s0201a1:382_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti hi upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā paccavekkhitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a1:382_1: Ettha ca asaṁvare ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhā yoniso paṭisaṅkhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:382_4: tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṁ sampalimaṭṭhaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:382_5: na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”tiādinā ādittapariyāyanayena veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:382_6: Cakkhundriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharatīti ettha cakkhumeva indriyaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:383_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṁvaro vā asaṁvaro vā natthi.
atk-s0201a1:383_1: Na hi cakkhupasādaṁ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṁ vā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a1:383_2: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṁ cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a1:383_3: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṁ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0201a1:383_7: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a1:384_1: na āvajjanādīnaṁ aññatarasamaye saṁvaro vā asaṁvaro vā atthi.
atk-s0201a1:384_2: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṁ vā muṭṭhasaccaṁ vā aññāṇaṁ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṁ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a1:384_4: Evaṁ hontopi so cakkhundriye asaṁvaroti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a1:384_8: yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṁvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṁvutā,
atk-s0201a1:384_9: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ arakkhitaṁ agopitameva hoti.
atk-s0201a1:384_13: tasmiṁ asaṁvare sati dvārampi aguttaṁ hoti,
atk-s0201a1:385_0: Tasmiṁ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṁ hoti,
atk-s0201a1:385_3: Yathā nagaradvāresu susaṁvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharādayo asaṁvutā,
atk-s0201a1:385_4: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ surakkhitaṁ sugopitameva hoti.
atk-s0201a1:385_5: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṁ paveso natthi,
atk-s0201a1:385_6: evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi suguttaṁ hoti,
atk-s0201a1:385_8: Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṁvaroti vutto.
atk-s0201a1:385_12: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutoti imassa vibhaṅge “iminā pātimokkhasaṁvarena upeto hoti…pe…
atk-s0201a1:385_14: Taṁ ekajjhaṁ katvā cakkhundriyasaṁvarena saṁvutoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:386_4: gharadvāre kavāṭaṁ viya saṁvari thakesi pidahīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:386_6: Tathā hi “cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato saṁvutassa viharato”ti etesu padesu ayameva attho dissati.
atk-s0201a1:387_0: Viharatīti evaṁ cakkhundriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto yena kenaci iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
atk-s0201a1:387_1: Yañhissātiādimhi yaṁ cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ assa bhikkhuno asaṁvutassa athaketvā apidahitvā viharantassāti evamattho veditabbo. Atha vā,
atk-s0201a1:388_1: Āsavā vighātapariḷāhāti cattāro āsavā ca aññe ca vighātakarā kilesapariḷāhā vipākapariḷāhā ca.
atk-s0201a1:388_2: Cakkhudvāre hi iṭṭhārammaṇaṁ āpāthagataṁ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a1:388_3: īdisaṁ aññasmimpi sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a1:388_4: sattoti vā sattassāti vā gaṇhantassa diṭṭhāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a1:388_5: sabbeheva sahajātaṁ aññāṇaṁ avijjāsavoti cattāro āsavā uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a1:388_8: Tepi hi asaṁvutasseva viharato uppajjeyyunti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a1:390_2: āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbāti ime chasu dvāresu cattāro cattāro katvā catuvīsati āsavā saṁvarena pahātabbāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a1:390_3: Sabbattheva cettha satisaṁvaro eva saṁvaroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:393_2: Yañhissāti yaṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātādīsu vā aññataraṁ assa.
atk-s0201a1:393_5: Kevalaṁ panidha aladdhaṁ cīvarādiṁ patthayato laddhaṁ vā assādayato kāmāsavassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:393_6: Īdisaṁ aññasmimpi sampattibhave sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavassa,
atk-s0201a1:393_7: ahaṁ labhāmi na labhāmīti vā mayhaṁ vā idanti attasaññaṁ adhiṭṭhahato diṭṭhāsavassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:393_8: Sabbeheva pana sahajāto avijjāsavoti evaṁ catunnaṁ āsavānaṁ uppatti vipākapariḷāhā ca navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:394_2: āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbāti ime ekamekasmiṁ paccaye cattāro cattāro katvā soḷasa āsavā iminā ñāṇasaṁvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a1:397_0: 24.Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassāti upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā khamo hoti sītassa sītaṁ khamati sahati,
atk-s0201a1:397_1: na avīrapuriso viya appamattakenapi sītena calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṁ vijahati.
atk-s0201a1:397_2: Apica kho lomasanāgatthero viya anappakenāpi sītena phuṭṭho na calati na kampati,
atk-s0201a1:397_4: Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāyaṁ padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye lokantarikaniraye
atk-s0201a1:398_0: Kevalañhi yo bhikkhu adhimattampi uṇhaṁ sahati sveva thero viya,
atk-s0201a1:398_2: Thero kira gimhasamaye pacchābhattaṁ bahicaṅkame nisīdi.
atk-s0201a1:398_7: Thero “uṇhabhayenevamhi āvuso idha nisinno”ti avīcimahānirayaṁ paccavekkhitvā nisīdiyeva.
atk-s0201a1:399_0: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṁ vā pānīyaṁ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṁsāre attano pettivisayūpapattiṁ
atk-s0201a1:399_2: Adhimattehi ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasamphassehi phuṭṭho cāpi tiracchānūpapattiṁ paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṁ na vijahatiyeva.
atk-s0201a1:399_3: Sarīsapasamphassena phuṭṭho cāpi anamatagge saṁsāre sīhabyagghādimukhesu anekavāraṁ parivattitapubbabhāvaṁ
atk-s0201a1:399_4: paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṁ na vijahatiyeva padhāniyatthero viya.
atk-s0201a1:400_0: Theraṁ kira khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṁsaṁ suṇantaṁ ghoraviso sappo ḍaṁsi.
atk-s0201a1:400_1: Thero jānitvāpi pasannacitto nisinno dhammaṁyeva suṇāti.
atk-s0201a1:400_3: Thero upasampadamaṇḍalaṁ ādiṁ katvā sīlaṁ paccavekkhitvā parisuddhasīlohamasmīti pītiṁ uppādesi.
atk-s0201a1:400_4: Saha pītuppādā visaṁ nivattitvā pathaviṁ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a1:400_5: Thero tattheva cittekaggataṁ labhitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a1:401_0: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe sutvā khantiguṇaṁyeva
atk-s0201a1:402_3: Taṁ aññataro mahāthero adhivāsetuṁ asakkonto dīghabhāṇako ariyavaṁsaṁ kathemīti sabbarattiṁ kolāhalaṁ karosītiādīhi akkosi.
atk-s0201a1:402_4: Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṁ gacchantā gāvutamattaṁ ekapathena agamaṁsu.
atk-s0201a1:402_6: Tato yattha dvinnaṁ vihārānaṁ maggo bhijjati,
atk-s0201a1:402_7: tattha ṭhatvā dīghabhāṇakatthero taṁ vanditvā “esa, bhante,
atk-s0201a1:402_10: Theropi vihāraṁ gantvā pāde pakkhāletvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a1:402_12: sakalagāvutaṁ paribhāsantaṁ na kiñci avocutthā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a1:403_0: Yo pana uppannā sārīrikā vedanā dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhā,
atk-s0201a1:403_8: Evaṁ sabhāvo hoti cittalapabbate padhāniyatthero viya.
atk-s0201a1:404_0: Therassa kira rattiṁ padhānena vītināmetvā ṭhitassa udaravāto uppajji.
atk-s0201a1:404_1: So taṁ adhivāsetuṁ asakkonto āvattati parivattati.
atk-s0201a1:404_7: Thero vedanaṁ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto muhuttena anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0201a1:405_4: Sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhaṁ patthayantassa kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a1:405_6: Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave sītaṁ vā uṇhaṁ vāti bhavaṁ patthayantassa bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a1:406_1: adhivāsanā pahātabbā”ti ime sītādīsu ekamekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā imāya khantisaṁvarasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0201a1:406_3: Ettha ca yasmā ayaṁ khanti sītādidhamme adhivāseti,
atk-s0201a1:409_0: 25.Paṭisaṅkhāyoniso caṇḍaṁ hatthiṁ parivajjetīti ahaṁ samaṇoti caṇḍassa hatthissa āsanne na ṭhātabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:409_1: Tatonidānañhi maraṇampi siyā maraṇamattampi dukkhanti evaṁ upāyena pathena paccayena paccavekkhitvā caṇḍaṁ hatthiṁ parivajjeti paṭikkamati.
atk-s0201a1:409_16: Anāsaneti ettha pana ayuttaṁ āsanaṁ anāsanaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:409_18: Agocareti etthapi ca ayutto gocaro agocaro,
atk-s0201a1:409_25: Te hi ekakammaṁ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti imaṁ brahmaṁ samānaṁ caranti,
atk-s0201a1:409_29: adhimucceyyuṁ “addhā ayamāyasmā akāsi vā karissati vā”ti.
atk-s0201a1:410_3: Hatthiādinidānena dukkhena phuṭṭhassa sukhaṁ patthayato kāmāsavo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a1:410_4: Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave īdisaṁ dukkhanti bhavaṁ patthentassa bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a1:411_1: parivajjanā pahātabbāti ime hatthiādīsu ekekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā iminā sīlasaṁvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a1:414_0: 26.Paṭisaṅkhāyoniso uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāsetīti “iti pāyaṁ vitakko akusalo,
atk-s0201a1:414_3: so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṁvattatī”tiādinā nayena yoniso kāmavitakke ādīnavaṁ paccavekkhitvā tasmiṁ
atk-s0201a1:414_4: tasmiṁ ārammaṇe uppannaṁ jātamabhinibbattaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti,
atk-s0201a1:416_0: Kiṁ kacavaraṁ viya piṭakenāti? Na hi, apica kho naṁ vinodeti tudati vijjhati nīharati.
atk-s0201a1:417_0: Kiṁ balibaddaṁ viya patodenāti? Na hi,
atk-s0201a1:417_1: atha kho naṁ byantīkaroti vigatantaṁ karoti.
atk-s0201a1:418_1: Anabhāvaṁ gametīti anu anu abhāvaṁ gameti,
atk-s0201a1:419_0: Ettha ca kāmavitakkoti “yo kāmapaṭisaṁyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo”ti vibhaṅge vutto.
atk-s0201a1:419_4: Sakiṁ vā uppanne vinodetvā dutiyavāre ajjhupekkhitā na hoti,
atk-s0201a1:419_8: Dhammeti teyeva kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi vā nava mahāvitakke.
atk-s0201a1:419_10: Avasesā “ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amaravitakko parānuddayatāpaṭisaṁyutto vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṁyutto
atk-s0201a1:421_1: vinodanā pahātabbāti ime kāmavitakkādivasena vuttappakārā āsavā iminā tasmiṁ tasmiṁ vitakke ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇasahitena
atk-s0201a1:424_1: bhāvanāya ca ānisaṁsaṁ upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti,
atk-s0201a1:424_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ime uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtā lokuttarabojjhaṅgā eva adhippetā,
atk-s0201a1:424_4: tathāpi ādikammikānaṁ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṁ lokiyalokuttaramissakena nesaṁ nayena atthavaṇṇanaṁ karissāmi.
atk-s0201a1:424_5: Idha pana lokiyanayaṁ pahāya lokuttaranayo eva gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a1:424_6: Tattha satisambojjhaṅgantiādinā nayena vuttānaṁ sattannaṁ ādipadānaṁyeva tāva –
atk-s0201a1:427_4: rañño bhaṇḍāgāriko rañño sāpateyyaṁ apilāpeti, ettakaṁ, mahārāja, hiraññaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:427_11: Kiccavaseneva hissa etaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ therena vuttaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:427_15: Tattha bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0201a1:428_8: Yathāha “satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho”ti.
atk-s0201a1:429_0: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a1:429_3: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vā bojjhaṅgā”ti.
atk-s0201a1:429_13: Evaṁ tāva ekassa ādipadassa atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a1:430_29: Evaṁ sesapadānampi atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a1:431_2: sabbatthikaṁ vadāmī”ti vacanato sabbesaṁ sesabojjhaṅgānaṁ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgova paṭhamaṁ vutto.
atk-s0201a1:431_3: Tato paraṁ “so tathā sato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinatī”tiādinā nayena sesabojjhaṅgānaṁ pubbāpariyavacane payojanaṁ sutteyeva vuttaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:432_0: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
atk-s0201a1:432_2: Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a1:432_22: Evaṁ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato ca satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti,
atk-s0201a1:433_0: Evaṁ tāva “satisambojjhaṅga”ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṁ sattannaṁ ādipadānaṁyeva atthavaṇṇanaṁ ñatvā idāni bhāveti vivekanissitantiādīsu evaṁ ñātabbā.
atk-s0201a1:433_2: attano cittasantāne punappunaṁ janeti abhinibbattetīti attho.
atk-s0201a1:433_6: Tassa nānattaṁ “ariyadhamme avinīto”ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:434_0: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṁ samucchedavivekanissitaṁ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:434_1: Tathā hi ayaṁ bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:434_6: te hi na kevalaṁ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu eva bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0201a1:434_9: Tasmā tesaṁ matena etesaṁ jhānānaṁ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:435_0: Kevalañhettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0201a1:435_6: Tathā hi ayaṁ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0201a1:435_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggattaṁ pariṇamantaṁ pariṇatañca paripaccantaṁ paripakkañcāti.
atk-s0201a1:435_9: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggattaṁ
atk-s0201a1:436_0: Idha pana nibbānaṁyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko,
atk-s0201a1:436_4: tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:436_6: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṁ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0201a1:436_7: ca pariṇataṁ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a1:437_2: Āsavuppattiyaṁ panettha imesaṁ uparimaggattayasampayuttānaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṁ kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavoti tayo āsavā,
atk-s0201a1:437_3: bhāvayato evaṁsa te āsavā na hontīti ayaṁ nayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:438_1: bhāvanā pahātabbāti ime tayo āsavā imāya maggattayasampayuttāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya pahātabbāti vuccantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:439_1: Idāni imehi sattahākārehi pahīnāsavaṁ bhikkhuṁ thomento āsavappahāne cassa ānisaṁsaṁ dassento eteheva
atk-s0201a1:439_2: ca kāraṇehi āsavappahāne sattānaṁ ussukkaṁ janento yato kho,
atk-s0201a1:439_8: Ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbāti ye āsavā dassanena pahātabbā,
atk-s0201a1:440_4: Vivattayi saṁyojananti dasavidhampi saṁyojanaṁ parivattayi nimmalamakāsi.
atk-s0201a1:440_9: Tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṁ jīvitaṁ viya.
atk-s0201a1:441_0: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti evaṁ arahattamaggena sammā mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca ye ime “kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati.
atk-s0201a1:441_6: “esevanto dukkhassa sabbapaccayasaṅkhayā”ti evaṁ vuttakoṭanto cāti evaṁ cattāro antā,
atk-s0201a1:441_7: tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṁ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṁ antimakoṭisaṅkhātaṁ antamakāsi paricchedaṁ parivaṭumaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0201a1:442_2: Bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti idaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyāpariyosānaṁ bhagavato bhāsitaṁ sukathitaṁ sulapitaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:442_3: evametaṁ bhagavā evametaṁ sugatāti matthakena sampaṭicchantā abbhanumodiṁsūti.
atk-s0201a1:443_1: taṁ pubbe vuttattā ca suviññeyyattā ca na vuttaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:448_2: tasmā taṁ dassetvā vassa apubbapadavaṇṇanaṁ karissāma.
atk-s0201a1:448_7: Sabbadisāsu yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṁ viya sabbapāramiyo ekasmiṁ attabhāve vipākaṁ dassāmāti
atk-s0201a1:448_15: Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṁ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuramāhaccatiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca.
atk-s0201a1:448_17: Sabbaṁ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:449_1: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:449_5: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṁ, cunda,
atk-s0201a1:450_0: Svāyaṁ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṁ mahānadīnaṁ udakamiva appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0201a1:450_2: Pacchābhattampi telamadhuphāṇitādīsu āhaṭesu gaṇḍiṁyeva paharitvā “amhākaṁ ācariyassa detha,
atk-s0201a1:450_4: Sā ca nesaṁ pavatti bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0201a1:450_5: Tato bhagavā ananucchavikanti dhammasaṁvegaṁ uppādetvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a1:451_3: Sā sikkhākāmānaṁ kulaputtānaṁ sikkhāpadapaññatti viya bhavissati nagaradvāre ṭhapitasabbakāyikaādāso viya ca,
atk-s0201a1:451_4: yathā hi nagaradvāre ṭhapite sabbakāyike ādāse cattāro vaṇṇā attano chāyaṁ disvā vajjaṁ pahāya niddosā honti,
atk-s0201a1:451_5: evameva sikkhākāmā kulaputtā payogamaṇḍanena attānaṁ maṇḍetukāmā imaṁ sabbakāyikādāsūpamaṁ desanaṁ āvajjitvā
atk-s0201a1:451_6: āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṁ vajjetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṁ pūrentā khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṁ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:452_8: tassa mā paṭiggāhakā bhavathāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:452_15: Maggaphalanibbānabhedo hi navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo nippariyāyadhammo nibbattitadhammo,
atk-s0201a1:452_16: na yena kenaci pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā dhammo.
atk-s0201a1:452_24: evaṁ karonto anupubbena nippariyāyadhammaṁ amataṁ nibbānaṁ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0201a1:452_27: na aññena pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā āmisaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:452_30: idhekacco vaṭṭaṁ patthento sampattibhavaṁ icchamāno dānaṁ deti…pe…
atk-s0201a1:453_1: Bhagavatā hi kathitattā bhikkhū maggaphalanibbānāni adhigacchanti.
atk-s0201a1:453_2: Vuttampi cetaṁ “so hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā,
atk-s0201a1:453_6: Maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā”ti ca –
atk-s0201a1:453_9: passaṁ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti ca.
atk-s0201a1:453_11: Bhagavatā hi kathitattā evaṁ jānanti “vivaṭṭaṁ patthetvā dānaṁ dento…pe…
atk-s0201a1:453_12: samāpattiyo nibbattento anukkamena amataṁ nibbānaṁ paṭilabhatī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:453_14: Bhagavatā hi anuññātattāyeva bhikkhūhi jīvakavatthuṁ ādiṁ katvā paṇītacīvaraṁ laddhaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:454_5: saṅghabhattaṁ uddesabhattaṁ nimantanaṁ salākabhattaṁ pakkhikaṁ uposathikaṁ pāṭipadika”nti evaṁ anuññātattāyeva paṇītabhojanaṁ laddhaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:454_10: pañca leṇānī”ti evaṁ bhagavatā anuññātattāyeva vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṁ guhāti imāni senāsanāni labhiṁsu.
atk-s0201a1:454_18: phāṇita”nti evamādinā nayena anuññātattā nānābhesajjāni labhiṁsu.
atk-s0201a1:455_3: samāpattiyo nibbattetvā anukkamena pariyāyāmisaṁ dibbasampattiṁ manussasampattiṁ paṭilabhatī”ti. Tadeva,
atk-s0201a1:455_4: yasmā nippariyāyadhammopi pariyāyadhammopi nippariyāyāmisampi pariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:455_5: tasmā tattha attano sāmibhāvaṁ dassento āha –
atk-s0201a1:456_2: Yañca kho etaṁ mayhameva santakaṁ āmisaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:456_6: Yo hi jinasāsane pabbajitvā paccayaparamo viharati catūsu taṇhuppādesu sandissamāno nikkhittadhuro dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:456_9: Yo pana anuññātapaccayesu appicchatādīni nissāya paṭisaṅkhā sevamāno paṭipattiparamo viharati catūsu ariyavaṁsesu sandissamāno,
atk-s0201a1:457_1: bhavissati vā anāgatamaddhānaṁ “kiṁ nu kho bhagavā sāvakānaṁ alābhatthiko evamāhā”ti,
atk-s0201a1:457_2: tesaṁ atipaṇītalābhatthiko ahaṁ evaṁ vadāmīti dassetumāha atthi me tumhesu…pe…
atk-s0201a1:458_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā anuddayā hitesitā,
atk-s0201a1:458_2: kena nu kho kāraṇena kena upāyena sāvakā dhammadāyādā assu dhammakoṭṭhāsasāmino,
atk-s0201a1:458_5: passati kira bhagavā āmisagarukānaṁ āmise upakkhalitānaṁ atītakāle tāva kapilassa bhikkhuno,
atk-s0201a1:458_9: Tasmā tesaṁ apāyā parimuttiṁ sabbaguṇasampattiñca icchanto āha –
atk-s0201a1:458_10: “atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ,
atk-s0201a1:458_12: Paccayagaruko ca catuparisantare kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nibbutaṅgāro viya ca nittejo nippabho hoti.
atk-s0201a1:458_13: Tato vivattitacitto dhammagaruko tejavā sīhova abhibhuyyacārī,
atk-s0201a1:459_2: mā āmisadāyādā”ti idaṁ anukampāya paṇītataraṁ lābhaṁ icchantena vuttaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:459_3: no alābhatthikenāti sāvetvā idāni imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṁ dassento āha “tumhe ca me,
atk-s0201a1:459_6: Tattha tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthāti tumhepi tena āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena ādiyā bhaveyyātha.
atk-s0201a1:459_8: viññūhi gārayhā bhaveyyāthāti vuttaṁ hoti. Kinti?
atk-s0201a1:460_0: Ahampi tena ādiyo bhaveyyanti ahampi tena tumhākaṁ āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena gārayho bhaveyyaṁ. Kinti? Āmisa…pe… dāyādāti.
atk-s0201a1:460_5: tattha viññū maṁ garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṁ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:460_6: Seyyathāpi nāma anākappasampanne bhikkhū disvā ācariyupajjhāye garahanti “kassime saddhivihārikā,
atk-s0201a1:460_8: seyyathā vā pana kulakumārake vā kulakumārikāyo vā dussīle pāpadhamme disvā mātāpitaro garahanti “kassime puttā,
atk-s0201a1:460_10: evameva maṁ viññū garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṁ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:461_0: Evaṁ imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṁ dassetvā karaṇe ānisaṁsaṁ dassento tumhe ca metiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:461_1: Tattha ahampi tena na ādiyo bhaveyyanti seyyathāpi nāma vattaparipūrake daharabhikkhū uddesaparipucchāsampanne
atk-s0201a1:461_7: paṭibalo vata ovadituṁ anusāsitu”nti ācariyupajjhāyā na ādiyā na gārayhā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a1:461_8: evameva ahampi tena tumhākaṁ dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvena kassa sāvakā nālakapaṭipadaṁ tuvaṭṭakapaṭipadaṁ
atk-s0201a1:461_9: candūpamapaṭipadaṁ rathavinītapaṭipadaṁ mahāgosiṅgasālapaṭipadaṁ mahāsuññatapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmaariyavaṁsesu
atk-s0201a1:461_10: sakkhibhūtā paccayagedhato vivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasamā viharantīti;
atk-s0201a1:461_12: asakkhi vata sāvake āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṁ chaḍḍāpetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipattipūrake kātu”nti viññūnaṁ na ādiyo na gārayho bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0201a1:461_13: Evamimasmiṁ pade adhippāyaṁ ñatvā sesaṁ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayapaccanīkena veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:461_14: Evaṁ imassa ovādassa karaṇe ānisaṁsaṁ dassetvā idāni taṁ ovādaṁ niyyātento āha –
atk-s0201a1:462_1: Evamimaṁ ovādaṁ niyyātetvā idāni tassā dhammadāyādapaṭipattiyā paripūrakāriṁ thometuṁ idhāhaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:462_3: Bhagavato hi thomanaṁ sutvāpi hontiyeva tadatthāya paṭipajjitāro.
atk-s0201a1:463_4: yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā paṭikkhittabhojano tittovāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:463_5: Catubbidhā hi pavāraṇā vassaṁvuṭṭhapavāraṇā paccayapavāraṇā anatirittapavāraṇā yāvadatthapavāraṇāti. Tattha,
atk-s0201a1:463_7: vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti ayaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a1:463_9: saṅghaṁ catumāsaṁ bhesajjena pavāretu”nti ca “aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti ca ayaṁ paccayapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a1:463_15: “Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī”ti ayaṁ yāvadatthapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a1:464_10: Ettha ca purimānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ pacchimāni sādhakāni.
atk-s0201a1:465_10: Jighacchādubbalyaparetāti jighacchāya ca dubbalyena ca paretā phuṭṭhā anugatā ca aṭṭhapi dasapi divasāni.
atk-s0201a1:465_11: Tattha keci jighacchitāpi na dubbalā honti,
atk-s0201a1:465_13: Ime pana na tādisāti dassetuṁ ubhayamāha.
atk-s0201a1:466_1: yasmiṁ ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni tiṇāni natthi,
atk-s0201a1:466_4: yattha sakaṭenapi chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti,
atk-s0201a1:467_0: Appāṇaketi nippāṇake piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena maritabbapāṇakarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe.
atk-s0201a1:467_1: Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āḷulite sukhumapāṇakā maranti,
atk-s0201a1:468_1: Yo imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ suṭṭhu sutavā punappunaṁ āvajjeti ca,
atk-s0201a1:468_3: Ayaṁ vutta-saddo kesohāraṇepi dissati “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu.
atk-s0201a1:468_13: sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha atthato pariṇāmetabbo.
atk-s0201a1:468_18: Evanti yathā idāni imaṁ khaṇaṁ vītināmemi,
atk-s0201a1:469_0: So taṁ piṇḍapātanti so taṁ sadevakena lokena sirasā sampaṭicchitabbarūpaṁ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṁ
atk-s0201a1:469_1: abhuñjitvā dhammadāyādabhāvaṁ ākaṅkhamāno ādittasīsūpamaṁ paccavekkhitvā teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṁ
atk-s0201a1:470_0: Atha dutiyassāti imasmiṁ pana vāre esa saṅkhepo,
atk-s0201a1:470_4: pabbajitena kho vāḷamigākule araññe bhesajjaṁ viya pañcakāmaguṇavāḷākule gāme piṇḍapātopi dukkhaṁ pariyesituṁ.
atk-s0201a1:470_5: Ayaṁ pana piṇḍapāto iti pariyesanādīnavavimutto ca sugatātiritto cāti ubhato sujātakhattiyakumāro viya hoti,
atk-s0201a1:470_6: yehi ca pañcahi kāraṇehi piṇḍapāto na paribhuñjitabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a1:470_8: puggalaṁ garahitvā na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “alajjipuggalassa santako”ti.
atk-s0201a1:470_10: Sāmikānukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu jighacchito”ti.
atk-s0201a1:470_11: So dhāto tasseva antevāsikādīsu anukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “antevāsikā aññe vā tappaṭibaddhā jighacchitā”ti,
atk-s0201a1:470_13: apica kho assaddhatāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu assaddho”ti.
atk-s0201a1:470_20: bhagavā tesaṁ aggoti evaṁ cintetvā ca so taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjitvā…pe…
atk-s0201a1:470_23: sopi bhuñjitabbakameva piṇḍapātaṁ na bhutto hoti.
atk-s0201a1:471_5: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti yadipi so bhikkhu evaṁ bhuñjitabbameva bhuñjitvā kātabbameva kareyya.
atk-s0201a1:471_6: Atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhūti yo purimo bhikkhu tampi piṇḍapātaṁ paṭikkhipitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karoti,
atk-s0201a1:471_7: soyeva mama dvīsu sūresu sūrataro viya dvīsu paṇḍitesu paṇḍitataro viya ca pujjataro ca pāsaṁsataro ca,
atk-s0201a1:471_8: dutiyabhikkhuto atirekena pūjanīyo ca pasaṁsanīyo cāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:472_0: Idāni tamatthaṁ kāraṇena sādhento taṁ kissa hetūtiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:472_3: kasmā so bhikkhu bhagavato pujjataro ca pāsaṁsataro cāti?
atk-s0201a1:472_4: Tañhi tassāti yasmā taṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṁ tassa bhikkhuno dīgharattaṁ appicchatāya…pe…
atk-s0201a1:472_6: Tassa hi sace aparena samayena paccayesu atricchatā vā pāpicchatā vā mahicchatā vā uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a1:472_7: Tato naṁ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭikkhepaṅkusena nivāressati “are tvaṁ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṁ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a1:472_9: Esa nayo asantuṭṭhiyā asaṁlekhassa cuppannassa nivāraṇe.
atk-s0201a1:472_10: Evaṁ tāvassa appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā saṁlekhāya saṁvattissati.
atk-s0201a1:473_1: idhekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hoti dupposo.
atk-s0201a1:473_2: Ekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi subharo hoti suposo. Kathaṁ?
atk-s0201a1:473_3: Yo hi ambilādīni laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati,
atk-s0201a1:473_4: aññassa ghare laddhaṁ aññassa ghare chaḍḍento sabbaṁ gāmaṁ vicaritvā rittapattova vihāraṁ pavisitvā nipajjati,
atk-s0201a1:473_6: Yo pana sālimaṁsodanādīnaṁ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṁ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti,
atk-s0201a1:473_7: tesaṁ vā sammukhāva taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ “kiṁ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnampi deti,
atk-s0201a1:473_9: Etaṁ disvā manussā dūrato parivajjanti dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā positunti.
atk-s0201a1:473_10: Yo pana yaṁkiñci lūkhaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṁ gantvā attano kammaṁ karoti,
atk-s0201a1:473_12: Yo ca paresampi appaṁ vā bahuṁ vā lūkhaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā dānaṁ ahīḷetvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā tesaṁ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā yāti,
atk-s0201a1:473_14: Etaṁ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti –
atk-s0201a1:473_16: mayameva naṁ posissāmā”ti paṭiññaṁ katvā posenti.
atk-s0201a1:474_0: Tattha sace aparena samayena assa attano vā upaṭṭhākānaṁ vā dubbharatānayena cittaṁ uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a1:474_2: “are tvaṁ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṁ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṁ cittaṁ uppādesī”ti evaṁ paccavekkhamāno,
atk-s0201a1:474_6: “are tvaṁ nāma tadā sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṁ paṭikkhipitvā tathā jighacchādubbalyaparetopi samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0201a1:474_11: Evamassime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:475_1: Atra hi pāḷiyaṁyeva appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāvīriyārambhavasena tīṇi āgatāni,
atk-s0201a1:475_6: kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
atk-s0201a1:475_9: Evaṁ ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:475_10: Dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:476_1: Etesu hi appicchakathā santosakathā asaṁsaggakathā sīlakathāti imā catasso kathā adhisīlasikkhāsaṅgahitāyeva.
atk-s0201a1:476_2: Pavivekakathā vīriyārambhakathā samādhikathāti imā tisso adhicittasikkhasaṅgahitā.
atk-s0201a1:476_3: Paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathāti imā tisso adhipaññāsikkhāsaṅgahitāti.
atk-s0201a1:476_4: Evaṁ dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:476_5: Tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:477_1: Paripūrā hi adhisīlasikkhā asekkho sīlakkhandhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0201a1:477_3: adhipaññāsikkhā asekkhā paññā-vimutti-vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhā evāti evaṁ tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:477_4: Pañca dhammakkhandhā paripūrā amataṁ nibbānaṁ paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:477_5: Seyyathāpi uparipabbate pāvussako mahāmegho abhivuṭṭho pabbatakandarasarasākhā paripūreti.
atk-s0201a1:477_11: evameva tassa bhikkhuno ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthuni ādiṁ katvā yāva amataṁ nibbānaṁ paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a1:477_12: Evamayaṁ bhikkhu dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno paramadhammadāyādaṁ labhatīti etamatthaṁ sampassamāno bhagavā “taṁ kissa hetu tañhi tassa,
atk-s0201a1:478_0: Evaṁ tassa bhikkhuno pujjatarapāsaṁsatarabhāvaṁ kāraṇena sādhetvā idāni te bhikkhū tathattāya sanniyojento tasmā tiha me bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:478_2: yasmā yo taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṁ kareyya,
atk-s0201a1:479_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṁ nidānapariyosānato pabhuti yāva no āmisadāyādāti suttappadesaṁ bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0201a1:479_1: Idaṁ vatvāna sugatoti idañca suttappadesaṁ vatvāva sobhanāya paṭipadāya gatattā sugatoti saṅkhaṁ pattoyeva bhagavā.
atk-s0201a1:479_2: Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisī paññattavarabuddhāsanato uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṁ attano mahāgandhakuṭiṁ pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya.
atk-s0201a1:480_0: Buddhā kira apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya vihāraṁ pavisantā dvīhi kāraṇehi pavisanti puggalathomanatthaṁ vā dhammathomanatthaṁ vā.
atk-s0201a1:480_4: dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā ānandaṁ vā kaccānaṁ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti,
atk-s0201a1:480_11: ahampi naṁ evameva byākareyyanti evaṁ te puggale thomessāmi,
atk-s0201a1:480_12: tato tesu gāravaṁ janetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti,
atk-s0201a1:480_13: tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti,
atk-s0201a1:480_14: te tehi niyojitā tisso sikkhā paripūrentā dukkhassantaṁ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:481_2: “mayi vihāraṁ paviṭṭhe tameva āmisadāyādaṁ garahanto dhammadāyādañca thomento imissaṁyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto dhammaṁ desessati,
atk-s0201a1:481_3: evaṁ dvinnampi amhākaṁ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṁ desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā.
atk-s0201a1:481_4: Caturoghanittharaṇaṭṭhena titthe ṭhapitā nāvā viya maggagamanaṭṭhena catuyuttaājaññaratho viya ca bhavissati.
atk-s0201a1:481_5: Yathā ca ‘evaṁ karontassa ayaṁ daṇḍo’ti parisati āṇaṁ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pāsādaṁ āruḷhe rājini tattheva
atk-s0201a1:481_6: nisinno senāpati taṁ raññā ṭhapitaṁ āṇaṁ pavatteti;
atk-s0201a1:481_7: evampi mayā ṭhapitaṁ desanaṁ imissaṁyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto thometvā desessati,
atk-s0201a1:481_8: evaṁ dvinnampi amhākaṁ matiyā desitā ayaṁ desanā balavatarā majjhanhikasūriyo viya pajjalissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:482_0: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā vihāraṁ pavisatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:482_3: sā ekavāraṁ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā cittagatiyā eva pāvisi.
atk-s0201a1:483_1: Evaṁ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṁ taṁ dhammaṁ thometukāmo tatra khoāyasmā sāriputto…pe…etadavoca.
atk-s0201a1:483_9: bhikkhaveti ettha pana buddhā bhagavanto sāvake ālapantā bhikkhaveti ālapanti.
atk-s0201a1:483_10: Sāvakā pana buddhehi sadisā mā homāti āvusoti paṭhamaṁ vatvā pacchā bhikkhaveti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0201a1:483_11: Buddhehi ca ālapito bhikkhusaṅgho bhadanteti paṭivacanaṁ deti,
atk-s0201a1:484_7: Vivekaṁ nānusikkhantīti tiṇṇaṁ vivekānaṁ aññatarampi nānusikkhanti,
atk-s0201a1:484_8: āmisadāyādāva hontīti imamatthaṁ āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū pucchi.
atk-s0201a1:485_0: Evaṁ vutte tamatthaṁ sotukāmā bhikkhū dūratopi khotiādimāhaṁsu.
atk-s0201a1:485_1: Tattha dūratopīti tiroraṭṭhatopi tirojanapadatopi anekayojanagaṇanatopīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:485_4: Āyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātūti āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassa bhāgo hotu,
atk-s0201a1:485_5: āyasmā pana sāriputto attano bhāgaṁ katvā vibhajatūti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:485_7: amhākaṁ pana savanaṁ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-s0201a1:485_12: Tato nesaṁ kathetukāmo thero tena hītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:486_1: āmisadāyādaṁ garahantena bhagavatā “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti ekenevākārena vuttamatthaṁ tīhi ākārehi dassento āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca –
atk-s0201a1:486_5: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṁ nānusikkhantī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:487_0: Ettāvatā yañca bhagavā āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṁ garahanto “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti āha,
atk-s0201a1:487_1: yañca attanā pucchaṁ pucchi “kittāvatā nu kho…pe…
atk-s0201a1:487_4: So ca kho bhagavato ādiyabhāvaṁ anāmasitvāva.
atk-s0201a1:487_5: Bhagavatoyeva hi yuttaṁ sāvake anuggaṇhantassa “ahampi tena ādiyo bhavissāmī”ti vattuṁ,
atk-s0201a1:488_1: satthu pavivittassāti satthuno tīhi vivekehi accantapavivittassa.
atk-s0201a1:488_4: Yadi pana tividhaṁ vivekaṁ sandhāya vadeyya,
atk-s0201a1:488_9: “bāhulikā”tiādinā upadhivivekañca dassetīti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:489_1: ye parato “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinā nayena vakkhati.
atk-s0201a1:489_6: Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṁ vuccanti avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0201a1:489_11: ettāvatā upadhivivekaṁ na paripūrentīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:490_0: Ettāvatā aniyameneva vatvā idāni desanaṁ niyamento “tatrāvuso”tiādimāha. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a1:490_1: Sāvakā “tīhi ṭhānehī”ti evañhi aniyametvāva vuccamāne “kampi maññe bhaṇati,
atk-s0201a1:490_3: “Therā navā majjhimā”ti evaṁ pana niyametvā vuccamāne amhe bhaṇatīti ādaraṁ karonti.
atk-s0201a1:490_4: Yathā raññā “amaccehi nagaravīthiyo sodhetabbā”ti vuttepi “kena nu kho sodhetabbā”ti maññamānā na sodhenti,
atk-s0201a1:490_5: attano attano gharadvāraṁ sodhetabbanti pana bheriyā nikkhantāya sabbe muhuttena sodhenti ca alaṅkaronti ca,
atk-s0201a1:491_4: “Kiṁ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṁ katvā imaṁ ṭhānaṁ patto”tiādīsu hi issariye dissati.
atk-s0201a1:491_9: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṁ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
atk-s0201a1:492_0: Iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhāti ettha gārayhāti garahitabbā.
atk-s0201a1:492_1: Therā nāma samānā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na upenti,
atk-s0201a1:492_5: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṁ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a1:492_7: Dutiyena ṭhānenāti etthāpi ime nāma āvuso therāpi samānā yesaṁ dhammānaṁ satthā pahānamāha,
atk-s0201a1:492_9: accharāsaṅghātamattampi ekamantaṁ nisīditvā cittekaggataṁ na labhanti,
atk-s0201a1:492_10: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṁ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a1:492_11: imaṁ nindaṁ āvuso labhantīti dassetīti evaṁ yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0201a1:492_15: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṁ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a1:493_1: Majjhimāti pañcavasse upādāya yāva nava vassā vuccanti.
atk-s0201a1:493_3: Yathā ca tattha navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:494_1: Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkhe vuttapaccanīkanayena sukkapakkhe attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:494_3: Ime vata therāpi samānā yojanaparamparāya araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni sevanti,
atk-s0201a1:494_5: evaṁ jiṇṇasarīrāpi āraddhavīriyā paccayadāyakānaṁ pasādaṁ janenti,
atk-s0201a1:494_6: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā pāsaṁsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a1:494_9: ayampi mahāthero saddhivihārikaantevāsikaparivārito hutvā nisīdituṁ yuttakālepi īdisepi vaye vattamāne bhattakiccaṁ katvā paviṭṭho sāyaṁ nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a1:494_14: sabbathāpi cittavivekaṁ pūretīti iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṁsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a1:494_16: Yasmiṁ kāle therassa paṭṭadukūlakoseyyādīni sukhasamphassāni lahucīvarādīni yuttāni,
atk-s0201a1:494_17: tasmimpi nāma kāle ayaṁ mahāthero paṁsukūlāni dhāreti,
atk-s0201a1:494_18: asithilaṁ sāsanaṁ gahetvā vigatanīvaraṇo phalasamāpattiṁ appetvā upadhivivekaṁ paripūrayamāno viharati,
atk-s0201a1:494_19: navamajjhimakāle kīdiso ahosīti iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā pāsaṁsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a1:495_5: te ca dhamme na pajahantī”ti evaṁ pahātabbadhammā vuttā.
atk-s0201a1:497_1: “satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṁ nānusikkhantī”tiādinā nayena vuttadesanāyanti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:497_3: doso ca pāpakoti ime dve dhammā pāpakā lāmakā,
atk-s0201a1:497_7: Tesu lobho āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṁ lābhe hoti,
atk-s0201a1:498_0: Idāni tesaṁ pahānūpāyaṁ dassento lobhassa ca pahānāyātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:498_2: tassa pana pāpakassa lobhassa ca dosassa ca pahānāya.
atk-s0201a1:498_3: Atthi majjhimā paṭipadāti maggaṁ sandhāya idaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:498_5: doso eko antoti ete dve ante na upeti,
atk-s0201a1:499_1: Sā hi saccānaṁ dassanāya saṁvattati dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti cakkhukaraṇī.
atk-s0201a1:499_7: Maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṁvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato.
atk-s0201a1:499_8: Nibbānaṁ nāma appaccayaṁ tassa pana sacchikiriyāya paccakkhakammāya saṁvattanato nibbānāya saṁvattatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a1:500_0: Idāni taṁ majjhimaṁ paṭipadaṁ sarūpato dassetukāmo “katamā ca sā”ti pucchitvā “ayamevā”tiādinā nayena vissajjeti.
atk-s0201a1:501_5: Aripahānāya saṁvattatītipi ariyena desitotipi ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāya saṁvattatītipi ariyo.
atk-s0201a1:501_13: tassa katamo so iti ceti attho,
atk-s0201a1:502_8: Nibbacanampi nesaṁ sammā passatīti sammādiṭṭhīti eteneva nayena veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:503_0: Tattha sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā micchādiṭṭhiṁ tappaccanīyakilese ca avijjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a1:508_0: Sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmaṁ tappaccanīyakilese ca kosajjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a1:510_0: Sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhiṁ tappaccanīyakilese ca uddhaccañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a1:511_3: yvāyaṁ cattāropi lokuttaramagge ekato katvā kathito “aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”,
atk-s0201a1:512_0: Evaṁ pahātabbadhammesu lobhadose tappahānupāyañca dassetvā idāni aññepi pahātabbadhamme tesaṁ pahānupāyañca dassento tatrāvuso,
atk-s0201a1:518_5: sativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānoti evaṁ imesaṁ dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a1:518_7: vitthāro pana “tattha katamo kodho”tiādinā vibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:519_0: Visesato cettha āmisadāyādo attanā alabhanto aññassa lābhino kujjhati,
atk-s0201a1:519_3: So evaṁ kuddho upanayhanto ca santepi aññassa lābhino guṇe makkheti,
atk-s0201a1:519_6: evaṁ makkhī paḷāsī tassa lābhasakkārādīsu kiṁ imassa imināti issati padussati,
atk-s0201a1:519_11: Lābhahetu kho pana attano santepi dose paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a1:519_15: So evaṁ paṭipanno sace yathādhippāyaṁ lābhaṁ labhati,
atk-s0201a1:519_19: Sace pana naṁ koci kiñci vadati “nayidaṁ evaṁ kātabba”nti,
atk-s0201a1:519_20: tena sāraddhacitto hoti bhākuṭikamukho “ko me tva”nti pasayha bhāṇī,
atk-s0201a1:519_22: Tato thambhena “ahameva seyyo”ti attānaṁ maññanto mānī hoti.
atk-s0201a1:519_25: So tehi mānātimānehi jātimadādianekarūpaṁ madaṁ janeti.
atk-s0201a1:520_0: Evaṁ āmisadāyādo aparimutto hoti imehi pāpakehi dhammehi aññehi ca evarūpehi.
atk-s0201a1:520_2: Pahānupāyo pāṭhato ca atthato ca sabbattha nibbisesoyeva.
atk-s0201a1:521_0: Ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthaṁ panettha ayaṁ bhedo ca kamo ca bhāvanānayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:521_2: ayañhi majjhimā paṭipadā kadāci ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a1:521_4: Ayañhi lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasena uppajjamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a1:522_14: Tasmā iminā kamena etāni aṅgāni vuttānīti evamettha kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:523_2: Idhekacco paṭhamaṁ upacārasamādhiṁ vā appanāsamādhiṁ vā uppādeti,
atk-s0201a1:523_4: so tañca taṁsampayutte ca dhamme aniccādīhi vipassati,
atk-s0201a1:523_9: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṁ vipassanaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
atk-s0201a1:523_10: so taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti,
atk-s0201a1:523_11: tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a1:524_0: Idha panekacco vuttappakāraṁ samathaṁ anuppādetvāva pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi vipassati,
atk-s0201a1:524_2: Tassa vipassanāpāripūriyā tattha jātānaṁ dhammānaṁ vossaggārammaṇato uppajjati cittassa ekaggatā,
atk-s0201a1:524_6: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
atk-s0201a1:525_0: Samathapubbaṅgamaṁ pana vipassanaṁ bhāvayatopi vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāvayatopi lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe samathavipassanā yuganaddhāva honti.
atk-s0201a1:529_4: bhagavato sāvatthiyaṁ vihāre avicchinneyevāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:530_3: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0201a1:530_4: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a1:531_2: Atha vā evaṁ gato tato āsannataraṁ ṭhānaṁ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṁ gantvātipi vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:531_3: Bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0201a1:531_4: evaṁ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṁ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-s0201a1:531_5: sītodakaṁ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṁ ekībhāvaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a1:531_10: kacci bhoto gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0201a1:531_11: taṁ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṁ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:531_12: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṁ sāretuṁ nirantaraṁ pavattetuṁ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sārāṇīyaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:531_16: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṁ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā yenatthena āgato,
atk-s0201a1:532_2: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṁ nisinno hoti,
atk-s0201a1:532_6: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṁ nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a1:533_0: Kathaṁ nisinno pana ekamantaṁ nisinno hotīti.
atk-s0201a1:533_3: atidūraṁ accāsannaṁ uparivātaṁ unnatapadesaṁ atisammukhaṁ atipacchāti.
atk-s0201a1:533_4: Atidūre nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a1:533_13: Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi,
atk-s0201a1:534_2: Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo nāma kulaputto tasmiṁyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulassa putto”ti evaṁ āgatā uccākulappasutā jātikulaputtā nāma.
atk-s0201a1:534_3: “Ye te kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā”ti evaṁ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārasampannā ācārakulaputtā nāma.
atk-s0201a1:535_8: evaṁ sabbathāpi anagāriyasaṅkhātaṁ pabbajjaṁ bhikkhubhāvaṁ vā upagatāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:535_11: Bhavaṁ tesaṁ gotamo samādapetāti te kulaputte bhavaṁ gotamo adhisīlādīni gāhetā sikkhāpetā.
atk-s0201a1:535_15: tepi tandiṭṭhikā honti taṁkhantikā taṁrucikāti attho.
atk-s0201a1:536_1: Esa kira pubbe aneke kulaputte agāramajjhe vasante devaputte viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāne anto ca bahi ca susaṁvihitārakkhe disvā,
atk-s0201a1:536_2: te aparena samayena bhagavato madhurarasaṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā saddhāya gharā nikkhamma pabbajitvā ghāsacchādanaparamatāya
atk-s0201a1:536_3: santuṭṭhe āraññakesu senāsanesu kenaci arakkhiyamānepi anussaṅkitāparisaṅkite haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe udaggudagge addasa,
atk-s0201a1:536_4: disvā ca imesaṁ kulaputtānaṁ “ayaṁ phāsuvihāro kaṁ nissāya uppanno”ti cintento “samaṇaṁ gotama”nti bhagavati pasādaṁ alattha.
atk-s0201a1:536_5: So taṁ pasādaṁ nivedetuṁ bhagavato santikaṁ āgato,
atk-s0201a1:537_0: Athassa bhagavā taṁ vacanaṁ sampaṭicchanto abbhanumodanto ca evametaṁ brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:537_1: Vacanasampaṭicchanānumodanatthoyeva hi ettha ayaṁ evanti nipāto.
atk-s0201a1:537_8: na sakkā appesakkhehi ajjhogāhitunti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:537_12: tathāpi yantaṁ “pañcadhanusatikaṁ pacchima”nti āraññikaṅganipphādakaṁ senāsanaṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:538_8: Ettha ca pariyantānanti imamekaṁ pariyāyaṁ ṭhapetvā sesapariyāyehi vanapatthāni veditabbānī.
atk-s0201a1:538_14: Kāyaviveke katepi tattha cittaṁ abhiramāpetuṁ dukkaraṁ.
atk-s0201a1:538_16: Haranti maññeti haranti viya ghasanti viya.
atk-s0201a1:538_18: Samādhiṁ alabhamānassāti upacārasamādhiṁ vā appanāsamādhiṁ vā alabhantassa.
atk-s0201a1:538_20: Īdisassa bhikkhuno tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehi vividhehi ca bhiṁsanakehi vanāni cittaṁ vikkhipanti maññeti,
atk-s0201a1:538_21: sabbaṁ brāhmaṇo saddhāpabbajitānaṁ kulaputtānaṁ araññavāse vimhito āha.
atk-s0201a1:540_1: Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva “evametaṁ brāhmaṇā”tiādīhi taṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā abbhanumoditvā
atk-s0201a1:540_2: ca yasmā soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇapariggaharahitānaṁyeva tādisāni senāsanāni durabhisambhavāni,
atk-s0201a1:540_4: attanā ca bodhisatto samāno tādiso ahosi,
atk-s0201a1:540_5: tasmā attano tādisānaṁ senāsanānaṁ durabhisambhavataṁ dassetuṁ,
atk-s0201a1:541_3: Bodhisattasseva satoti bujjhanakasattasseva sammāsambodhiṁ adhigantuṁ arahasattasseva sato,
atk-s0201a1:541_5: Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato bodhiyā
atk-s0201a1:541_6: satto laggo “pattabbā mayā esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṁ amuñcantoyeva āgato,
atk-s0201a1:541_8: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṁ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:541_9: Ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti ye keci pabbajjūpagatā vā bhovādino vā.
atk-s0201a1:542_1: Aparisuddhakāyakammantasandosahetūti aparisuddhassa kāyakammantasaṅkhātassa attano dosassa hetu,
atk-s0201a1:542_13: idāni anubandhitvā anayabyasanaṁ āpādeyyu”nti araññaṁ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a1:542_14: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṁ vā paṇṇasaddaṁ vā sutvā,
atk-s0201a1:542_16: āgantvā parehi parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti.
atk-s0201a1:542_17: Evaṁ taṁ bhayabheravaṁ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a1:543_1: paṭisevāmīti ahaṁ kho pana aparisuddhakāyakammanto hutvā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na paṭisevāmi.
atk-s0201a1:543_2: Ye hi voti ettha voti nipātamattaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:543_3: Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca.
atk-s0201a1:543_5: Tesamahaṁ aññataroti tesaṁ ahampi eko aññataro.
atk-s0201a1:543_6: Bodhisatto hi gahaṭṭhopi pabbajitopi parisuddhakāyakammantova hoti.
atk-s0201a1:543_11: atirekaṁ sotthibhāvaṁ atirekena vā sotthibhāvamāpajjinti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:546_3: vacīkammantavāre tāva aparisuddhavacīkammantāti aparisuddhena musāvādādinā vacīkammantena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a1:546_6: pisuṇavācāya mittabhedaṁ katvā pharusavācāya paresaṁ parisamajjhe mammāni tuditvā niratthakavācāya parasattānaṁ
atk-s0201a1:546_10: idāni anubandhitvā anayabyasanaṁ pāpeyyu”nti araññaṁ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a1:546_11: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṁ vā paṇṇasaddaṁ vā sutvā idānimhā naṭṭhā”ti tasanti vittasanti āgantvā parehi
atk-s0201a1:546_12: parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti.
atk-s0201a1:546_13: Evaṁ taṁ bhayabheravaṁ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti,
atk-s0201a1:547_0: Manokammantavāre aparisuddhamanokammantāti aparisuddhena abhijjhādinā manokammantena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a1:547_2: Te paresaṁ rakkhitagopitesu bhaṇḍesu abhijjhāvisamalobhaṁ uppādetvā parassa kujjhitvā parasatte micchādassanaṁ gāhāpetvā mayaṁ ayuttamakamhā…pe…
atk-s0201a1:548_0: Ājīvavāre aparisuddhājīvāti aparisuddhena vejjakammadūtakammavaḍḍhipayogādinā ekavīsatianesanabhedena ājīvena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a1:548_3: “sāsanasodhakā kira tepiṭakā bhikkhū sāsanaṁ sodhetuṁ nikkhantā,
atk-s0201a1:548_4: ajja vā sve vā idhāgamissantī”ti araññaṁ pavisitvā gacchantare vā…pe…
atk-s0201a1:548_6: Te hi āgantvā parivāretvā gahitā viya odātavatthanivāsitā viya ca hontīti.
atk-s0201a1:549_1: Ito paraṁ abhijjhālūtiādīsu kiñcāpi abhijjhābyāpādā manokammantena saṅgahitā tathāpi nīvaraṇavasena puna vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:549_6: tesaṁ avavatthitārammaṇānaṁ araññe viharantānaṁ divā diṭṭhaṁ rattiṁ bhayabheravaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhāti –
atk-s0201a1:549_8: rajjuṁ vā lataṁ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a1:549_10: thalaṁ vā pabbataṁ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayabyasanaṁ āpāditā viya hontī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:550_4: abhadrakena paresaṁ anatthajanakena cittasaṅkappena samannāgatāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:550_6: Bhayabheravāvhāyanaṁ ito pabhuti abhijjhāluvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:550_9: Na kho panāhaṁ byāpannacittoti ettha pana mettacitto ahaṁ hitacittoti dasseti,
atk-s0201a1:550_11: Evaṁ sabbattha vuttadosapaṭipakkhavasena bodhisattassa guṇā vaṇṇetabbā.
atk-s0201a1:551_0: 39.Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitāti cittagelaññabhūtena thinena sesanāmakāyagelaññabhūtena middhena ca pariyuṭṭhitā,
atk-s0201a1:552_1: uddhaccena hi ekārammaṇe cittaṁ vipphandati dhajayaṭṭhiyaṁ vātena paṭākā viya.
atk-s0201a1:553_1: Kiṁ nu kho idanti ārammaṇaṁ kaṅkhanato kaṅkhā,
atk-s0201a1:554_6: Te parehi “asuko ca kira asuko ca attānaṁ ukkaṁsenti,
atk-s0201a1:554_9: gaṇhatha ne”ti anubaddhā palāyitvā araññaṁ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vāti kāyakammantasadisaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:555_2: gāmadārakā viya bhayabahulā asūrā kātarāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:556_3: paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā ca abhisaṅkharitvā katā sakkārāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a1:556_4: Yā ca parehi attano gāravakiriyā pupphādīhi vā pūjā.
atk-s0201a1:557_0: Eko kira piyagāmiko nāma bhikkhu samādinnadhutaṅgānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ lābhaṁ disvā “ahampi dhutaṅgaṁ samādiyitvā
atk-s0201a1:557_1: lābhaṁ uppādemī”ti cintetvā sosānikaṅgaṁ samādāya susāne vasati.
atk-s0201a1:557_2: Athekadivasaṁ eko kammamutto jaraggavo divā gocare caritvā rattiṁ tasmiṁ susāne pupphagumbe sīsaṁ katvā romanthayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a1:557_3: Piyagāmiko rattiṁ caṅkamanā nikkhanto tassa hanusaddaṁ sutvā cintesi “addhā maṁ lābhagiddho esa susāne vasatīti ñatvā devarājā viheṭhetuṁ āgato”ti,
atk-s0201a1:557_4: so jaraggavassa purato añjaliṁ paggahetvā “sappurisa devarāja ajja me ekarattiṁ khama,
atk-s0201a1:557_5: sve paṭṭhāya na evaṁ karissāmī”ti namassamāno sabbarattiṁ yācanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a1:557_6: Tato sūriye uṭṭhite taṁ disvā kattarayaṭṭhiyā paharitvā palāpesi “sabbarattiṁ maṁ bhiṁsāpesī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:559_4: Duvidhā hi sati paññāsampayuttā paññāvippayuttā ca.
atk-s0201a1:559_9: dubbalāya satiyā satikiccābhāvatoti etamatthaṁ dīpetuṁ “asampajānā”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:559_10: Te evaṁ muṭṭhassatī asampajānā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṁ na sakkontīti sabbaṁ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a1:560_2: Samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena tesaṁ samādhivirahānaṁ cittaṁ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati,
atk-s0201a1:560_3: vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu uddhaccena ekārammaṇe vipphandati.
atk-s0201a1:560_4: Pubbe vuttanayenena te evaṁ asamāhitā vibbhantacittā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṁ na sakkontīti sabbaṁ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a1:561_14: Te duppaññā eḷamūgā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṁ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a1:561_15: Tesaṁ avavatthitārammaṇānaṁ araññe viharantānaṁ divā diṭṭhaṁ rattiṁ bhayabheravaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhāti “te ākulacittā appamattakenapi tasanti vittasanti,
atk-s0201a1:561_16: rajjuṁ vā lataṁ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a1:561_18: thalaṁ vā pabbataṁ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayavyasanaṁ āpāditā viya hontī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:561_19: Evaṁ taṁ bhayabheravaṁ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a1:561_20: Paññāsampannohamasmīti ettha paññāsampannoti paññāya sampanno samannāgato,
atk-s0201a1:561_23: apica kho pana imesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇavavatthānapaññāyāti attho.
atk-s0201a1:565_1: Bodhisatto kira imāni soḷasārammaṇāni pariggaṇhanto ca bhayabheravaṁ adisvā bhayabheravaṁ nāma evarūpāsu rattīsu evarūpe senāsane ca paññāyati,
atk-s0201a1:565_3: etamatthaṁ bhagavā idāni brāhmaṇassa dassento tassa mayhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:566_0: Tattha yā tāti ubhayametaṁ rattīnaṁyeva uddesaniddesavacanaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:566_2: Tasmā abhiññātāti candapāripūriyā candaparikkhayenāti evamādīhi lakkhaṇehi ñātāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:567_0: Cātuddasīti pakkhassa paṭhamadivasato pabhuti catuddasannaṁ pūraṇī ekā ratti.
atk-s0201a1:567_3: Etā tisso tisso katvā cha rattiyo,
atk-s0201a1:567_4: tasmā sabbattha pakkhavacanaṁ yojetabbaṁ “pakkhassa cātuddasī pakkhassa pañcadasī pakkhassa aṭṭhamī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:567_7: Buddhe kira bhagavati anuppannepi uppajjitvā aparinibbutepi pañcamī anabhilakkhitāyeva,
atk-s0201a1:567_8: parinibbute pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherā cintesuṁ “dhammassavanaṁ cirena hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:568_6: Lokiyā hi dibbādhivatthāti vā maññamānā tesuyeva vā dibbasaññino hutvā ārāmavanarukkhe cittīkaronti, pūjenti,
atk-s0201a1:568_12: Appeva nāma passeyyanti api nāma taṁ bhayabheravaṁ passeyyameva.
atk-s0201a1:568_14: “etadahosi yaṁnūnāha”nti evaṁ cintitakālato paṭṭhāya aññena kālena.
atk-s0201a1:569_0: Tattha ca me brāhmaṇa viharatoti tathārūpesu senāsanesu yaṁ yaṁ manussānaṁ āyācanaupahārakaraṇārahaṁ
atk-s0201a1:569_3: yaṁ divāpi passantānaṁ hadayaṁ maññe phalati,
atk-s0201a1:569_4: taṁ ṭhānaṁ sandhāyāha “tattha ca me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a1:569_6: Mago vā āgacchatīti siṅgāni vā khurāni vā koṭṭento gokaṇṇakhaggadīpivarāhādibhedo mago vā āgacchati,
atk-s0201a1:571_0: Magarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase”ti. ;
atk-s0201a1:572_0: Moro vā kaṭṭhaṁ pātetīti moro vā sukkhakaṭṭhaṁ rukkhato cāletvā pāteti.
atk-s0201a1:572_2: tena yo koci pakkhīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:572_3: Atha vā moro vāti vā saddena añño vā koci pakkhīti.
atk-s0201a1:572_5: Vāto vā paṇṇakasaṭaṁ eretīti vāto vā paṇṇakacavaraṁ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0201a1:572_6: Etaṁ nūna taṁ bhayabheravaṁ āgacchatīti yametaṁ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a1:572_8: Ito pabhuti ca ārammaṇameva bhayabheravanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:572_9: Parittassa ca adhimattassa ca bhayassa ārammaṇattā sukhārammaṇaṁ rūpaṁ sukhamiva.
atk-s0201a1:572_10: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ aññadatthu bhayapaṭikaṅkhī viharāmīti ahaṁ kho kiṁ kāraṇaṁ ekaṁseneva bhayaṁ ākaṅkhamāno icchamāno hutvā viharāmi.
atk-s0201a1:573_0: Yathābhūtaṁ yathābhūtassāti yena yena iriyāpathena bhūtassa bhavitassa sato vattamānassa samaṅgībhūtassa vā.
atk-s0201a1:573_2: Tathābhūtaṁ tathābhūto vāti tena teneva iriyāpathena bhūto bhavito santo vattamāno samaṅgībhūto vāti attho.
atk-s0201a1:573_4: paṭivinemīti bodhisattassa kira caṅkamantassa tasmiṁ magasiṅgakhurasaddādibhede bhayabheravārammaṇe āgate neva mahāsatto tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a1:573_6: atha kho caṅkamantova parivīmaṁsanto parivicinanto bhayabheravaṁ na passati,
atk-s0201a1:573_9: na bhayabheravanti tato tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā sayati vā.
atk-s0201a1:573_12: Ito parañca iriyāpathapaṭipāṭiyā avatvā āsannapaṭipāṭiyā iriyāpathā vuttāti veditabbā,
atk-s0201a1:573_13: caṅkamantassa hi bhayabherave āgate na ṭhito na nisinno na nipanno ṭhitassāpi āgate na caṅkamīti evaṁ tassa āsannapaṭipāṭiyā vuttāti.
atk-s0201a1:576_1: Evaṁ bhiṁsanakesupi ṭhānesu attano bhayabheravābhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni jhāyīnaṁ sammohaṭṭhānesu attano asammohavihāraṁ dassetuṁ santi kho pana,
atk-s0201a1:577_7: Idhekacco odātakasiṇalābhī divā parikammaṁ katvā divā samāpanno divāyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṁ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a1:577_8: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti.
atk-s0201a1:577_10: Odātakasiṇapharaṇavasena cassa visadaṁ hoti vibhūtaṁ suvibhūtaṁ. So,
atk-s0201a1:577_11: divā vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya odātakasiṇapharaṇavisadavibhūtatāya ca rattiṁyeva samānaṁ divāti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a1:577_12: Idha panekacco nīlakasiṇalābhī rattiṁ parikammaṁ katvā rattiṁ samāpanno rattiṁyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṁ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a1:577_13: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti.
atk-s0201a1:577_16: So rattiṁ vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya nīlakasiṇapharaṇāvisadāvibhūtatāya ca divāyeva samānaṁ rattīti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a1:578_0: Sakuṇarutato pana idhekacco antosenāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a1:578_1: Atha divā ravanakasakuṇā kākādayo candālokena divāti maññamānā rattiṁ ravanti,
atk-s0201a1:578_3: So tesaṁ saddaṁ sutvā rattiṁyeva samānaṁ divāti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a1:578_4: Idha panekacco pabbatantare gambhīrāya ghanavanappaṭicchannāya giriguhāya sattāhavaddalikāya vattamānāya antarahitasūriyāloke kāle nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a1:578_5: Atha rattiṁ ravanakasakuṇā ulūkādayo majjhanhikasamayepi tattha tattha samandhakāre nilīnā rattisaññāya vā aññehi vā kāraṇehi ravanti.
atk-s0201a1:578_6: So tesaṁ saddaṁ sutvā divāyeva samānaṁ rattīti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a1:579_1: sañjānāmīti pākaṭo bodhisattassa rattindivaparicchedo sattāhavaddalepi candimasūriyesu adissamānesupi jānātiyeva “ettakaṁ purebhattakālo gato,
atk-s0201a1:579_7: Anacchariyañcetaṁ yaṁ pūritapāramī bodhisatto evaṁ jānāti.
atk-s0201a1:579_8: Padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṁ sāvakānampi hi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a1:580_0: Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre kira godattatthero dvaṅgulakāle bhattaṁ gahetvā aṅgulakāle bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a1:580_1: Sūriye adissamānepi pātoyeva senāsanaṁ pavisitvā tāya velāya nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a1:580_2: Ekadivasaṁ ārāmikā “sve therassa nikkhamanakāle passāmā”ti bhattaṁ sampādetvā kālatthambhamūle nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0201a1:580_4: Tato pabhuti kira sūriye adissamānepi therassa nikkhamanasaññāya eva bheriṁ ākoṭenti.
atk-s0201a1:581_4: Atha nikkhante paṭhame yāme there muggaraṁ gahetvā ṭhitamatteyeva ekaṁ dve vāre paharanteyeva vā yāmayantaṁ patati,
atk-s0201a1:581_5: evaṁ tīsu yāmesu samaṇadhammaṁ katvā thero pātoyeva gāmaṁ pavisitvā piṇḍapātaṁ ādāya vihāraṁ āgantvā
atk-s0201a1:581_6: bhojanavelāya pattaṁ gahetvā divā vihāraṭṭhānaṁ gantvā samaṇadhammaṁ karoti.
atk-s0201a1:581_7: Bhikkhū kālatthambhaṁ disvā therassa adisvā āgamanatthāya pesenti.
atk-s0201a1:581_8: So bhikkhu theraṁ divā vihāraṭṭhānā nikkhamantameva vā antarāmagge vā passati.
atk-s0201a1:581_9: Evaṁ padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṁ sāvakānampi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0201a1:582_1: vadeyyāti ettha pana “yaṁ kho taṁ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a1:582_3: sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vacanaṁ vadamāno koci sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a1:582_6: Mameva taṁ vacanaṁ vadamāno sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a1:582_8: na vitathavādī assāti evaṁ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:583_7: mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa rakkhitā gopayitāti.
atk-s0201a1:583_8: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti idha devamanussaggahaṇena ca bhabbapuggalaveneyyasatteyeva gahetvā
atk-s0201a1:583_9: tesaṁ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya attano uppattiṁ dassetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:583_10: Atthāyāti hi vutte paramatthatthāya nibbānāyāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:583_11: Hitāyāti vutte taṁ sampāpakamaggatthāyāti vuttaṁ hoti,
atk-s0201a1:583_12: nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttari hitaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a1:583_15: Vuttañcetaṁ “ayaṁ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0201a1:586_1: Evaṁ bhagavā buddhaguṇapaṭilābhāvasānaṁ attano asammohavihāraṁ brāhmaṇassa dassetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṁ koṭippattaṁ asammohavihāraṁ adhigato,
atk-s0201a1:586_2: taṁ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṁ āraddhaṁ kho pana me brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:587_0: Keci panāhu “imaṁ asammohavihāraṁ sutvā brāhmaṇassa cittamevaṁ uppannaṁ ‘kāya nu kho paṭipadāya imaṁ patto’ti,
atk-s0201a1:587_1: tassa cittamaññāya imāyāhaṁ paṭipadāya imaṁ uttamaṁ asammohavihāraṁ pattoti dassento evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0201a1:588_0: Tattha āraddhaṁ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a1:588_2: na mayā ayaṁ uttamo asammohavihāro kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena vā adhigato,
atk-s0201a1:588_3: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0201a1:588_4: bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ āraddhaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0201a1:589_0: Upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhāti na kevalañca vīriyameva,
atk-s0201a1:589_3: Passaddho kāyoti kāyacittappassaddhisambhavena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi.
atk-s0201a1:589_4: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0201a1:589_5: tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva passaddho kāyoti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:589_6: Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-s0201a1:589_8: Samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṁ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṁ appitaṁ viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a1:589_9: Samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṁ acalaṁ nipphandananti,
atk-s0201a1:590_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ ādiṁ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṁ visesaṁ dassento so kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:590_2: catutthajjhānaṁ upasampajjavihāsinti ettha tāva yaṁ vattabbaṁ siyā,
atk-s0201a1:590_7: Kiṁ katvā pana bhagavā imāni jhānāni upasampajja vihāsīti,
atk-s0201a1:591_0: Imāni ca pana cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti,
atk-s0201a1:591_6: Te hi samāpajjitvā ekaggacittā sukhaṁ divasaṁ viharissāmāti iccevaṁ kasiṇaparikammaṁ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti.
atk-s0201a1:591_7: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṁ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmāti nibbattentānaṁ vipassanāpādakāni honti.
atk-s0201a1:591_8: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā
atk-s0201a1:591_9: bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a1:591_11: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā sattāhaṁ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0201a1:591_12: nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ patvā sukhaṁ viharissāmāti nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a1:591_14: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmāti nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a1:592_1: taṁ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva ahosi abhiññāpādakañca sabbakiccasādhakañca,
atk-s0201a1:595_2: tesaṁ ekadesaṁ dassento so evaṁ samāhite cittetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:595_3: Tattha dvinnaṁ vijjānaṁ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthārito.
atk-s0201a1:595_7: Ayaṁ kho me brāhmaṇāti ayañca appanāvāro tattha anāgatoti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0201a1:595_10: Abhininnāmesinti ca vacanato soti ettha so ahanti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:596_0: Yasmā cidaṁ bhagavato vasena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ āgataṁ,
atk-s0201a1:596_1: tasmā “so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti ettha evaṁ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:596_2: Ettha hi so tato cutoti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:596_5: Tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmoti tatrāpi tusitabhavane setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṁ.
atk-s0201a1:596_12: Sotato cutoti so ahaṁ tato tusitabhavanato cuto.
atk-s0201a1:596_13: Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-s0201a1:597_0: Ayaṁ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā.
atk-s0201a1:597_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako moho vuccati.
atk-s0201a1:597_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṁ attho,
atk-s0201a1:597_9: Yojanā panettha ayaṁ kho me vijjā adhigatā,
atk-s0201a1:598_4: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa,
atk-s0201a1:598_6: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya,
atk-s0201a1:598_14: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṁ laddha”nti.
atk-s0201a1:601_1: Cutūpapātakathāyaṁ yasmā idha bhagavato vasena pāḷi āgatā,
atk-s0201a1:602_3: Yasmā ca pūritapāramīnaṁ mahāsattānaṁ parikammakiccaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a1:602_4: Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatteyeva anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussaranti,
atk-s0201a1:602_6: Tasmā yo tattha parikammaṁ ādiṁ katvā bhāvanānayo vutto,
atk-s0201a1:605_1: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṁ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṁ catutthajjhānacittaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:605_3: Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṁ khayoti vuccati,
atk-s0201a1:605_8: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṁ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ jāniṁ paṭivijjhiṁ.
atk-s0201a1:605_9: Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṁ taṇhaṁ ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti.
atk-s0201a1:605_11: taṁ tesaṁ appavattiṁ nibbānaṁ ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti.
atk-s0201a1:605_12: Tassa sampāpakaṁ ariyamaggaṁ ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṁ
atk-s0201a1:606_0: Evaṁ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:606_1: Tassa me evaṁ jānato evaṁ passatoti tassa mayhaṁ evaṁ jānantassa evaṁ passantassa.
atk-s0201a1:606_7: Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0201a1:606_9: tena hi ñāṇena bhagavā paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a1:606_18: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhabhedā jāti,
atk-s0201a1:606_19: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṁ āpajjanena khīṇā,
atk-s0201a1:606_20: taṁ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṁ āyatiṁ appaṭisandhikaṁ hotī”ti jānanto abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a1:607_3: puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṁ sattasekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṁ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0201a1:607_5: Tasmā bhagavā attano brahmacariyavāsaṁ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṁ brahmacariya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a1:607_6: Kataṁ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṁ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0201a1:607_9: Tasmā bhagavā attano karaṇīyaṁ paccavekkhanto “kataṁ karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a1:608_1: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṁ me natthīti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a1:608_2: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā evaṁpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṁ khandhasantānaṁ mayhaṁ natthi.
atk-s0201a1:608_3: Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
atk-s0201a1:608_4: Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a1:609_0: Idāni evaṁ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṁ āsavānaṁ khayañāṇādhigamaṁ brāhmaṇassa dassento,
atk-s0201a1:609_7: āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṁ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe saṅgahetvā pakāsento attano asammohavihāraṁ brāhmaṇassa dassesi.
atk-s0201a1:612_4: atthi nu khvassa aññampi kiñci karaṇīya”nti.
atk-s0201a1:612_5: Athassa bhagavā ajjhāsayaṁ viditvā iminā ajjhāsayānusandhinā,
atk-s0201a1:612_7: Tattha siyā kho pana te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a1:612_10: Na kho panetaṁ brāhmaṇa evaṁ daṭṭhabbanti etaṁ kho pana, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a1:612_11: tayā mayhaṁ pantasenāsanapaṭisevanaṁ avītarāgāditāyāti evaṁ na daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:612_12: Evaṁ pantasenāsanapaṭisevane akāraṇaṁ paṭikkhipitvā kāraṇaṁ dassento dve kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:612_16: dve atthe dve kāraṇāni sampassamānoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0201a1:612_17: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti ettha diṭṭhadhammo nāma ayaṁ paccakkho attabhāvo.
atk-s0201a1:612_19: ekakassa hi araññe antamaso uccārapassāvakiccaṁ upādāya sabbeva iriyāpathā phāsukā honti,
atk-s0201a1:612_21: Pacchimañca janataṁ anukampamānoti kathaṁ araññavāsena pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti?
atk-s0201a1:612_22: Saddhāpabbajitā hi kulaputtā bhagavato araññavāsaṁ disvā bhagavāpi nāma araññasenāsanāni na muñcati,
atk-s0201a1:612_23: yassa nevatthi pariññātabbaṁ na pahātabbaṁ na bhāvetabbaṁ na sacchikātabbaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:612_24: kimaṅgaṁ pana mayanti cintetvā tattha vasitabbameva maññissanti.
atk-s0201a1:615_4: Yathā taṁ arahatā sammāsambuddhenāti yathā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anukampeyya,
atk-s0201a1:616_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna taṁ bhagavato dhammadesanaṁ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca abhikkantaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:616_8: “Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a1:617_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
atk-s0201a1:621_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṁ budho”ti. –
atk-s0201a1:622_0: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṁsāvasena cāyaṁ dvikkhattuṁ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:623_6: abhikkantaṁ yadidaṁ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṁ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0201a1:623_7: Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṁ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi –
atk-s0201a1:624_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṁyeva thometi.
atk-s0201a1:624_7: Maggaṁ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0201a1:625_2: evaṁ saddhammavimukhaṁ asaddhamme patitaṁ maṁ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0201a1:625_4: Evaṁ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṁ sāsanaṁ vivarantena,
atk-s0201a1:625_8: evaṁ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṁsakadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0201a1:625_9: mayhaṁ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0201a1:628_0: Evaṁ desanaṁ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattayapasannacitto pasannākāraṁ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a1:628_2: Bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti bhavaṁ me gotamo saraṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:628_4: hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ gacchāmi, bhajāmi, sevāmi,
atk-s0201a1:628_12: Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0201a1:628_17: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a1:631_3: Appaṭikūlaṁ madhuramimaṁ paguṇaṁ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0201a1:633_0: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṁ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a1:634_0: Bhikkhūnaṁ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0201a1:637_9: saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiparikilesaṁ hanati vināsetīti attho,
atk-s0201a1:638_0: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṁ bhayaṁ hiṁsati buddho.
atk-s0201a1:638_6: vuttappakārena cittuppādena etāni me tīṇi saraṇāni saraṇaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:638_8: Evaṁ tāva saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ yo ca saraṇaṁ gacchatīti idaṁ tayaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:639_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ lokuttaraṁ lokiyañca.
atk-s0201a1:639_1: Tattha lokuttaraṁ diṭṭhasaccānaṁ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṁ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati.
atk-s0201a1:639_2: Lokiyaṁ puthujjanānaṁ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṁ hutvā ijjhati,
atk-s0201a1:639_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a1:640_0: Tayidaṁ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti.
atk-s0201a1:640_1: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṁ nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ attānaṁ buddhassa niyyātemi,
atk-s0201a1:640_4: Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ buddhaparāyaṇo,
atk-s0201a1:640_6: saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ tapparāyaṇabhāvo.
atk-s0201a1:640_7: Sissabhāvūpagamanaṁ nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ buddhassa antevāsiko,
atk-s0201a1:640_10: Paṇipāto nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammaṁ buddhādīnaṁyeva tiṇṇaṁ vatthūnaṁ karomi,
atk-s0201a1:640_11: iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0201a1:640_12: Imesañhi catunnaṁ ākārānaṁ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṁyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:641_7: buddho me saraṇaṁ leṇaṁ tāṇanti evampi attasanniyyātanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:641_10: sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṁ passeyyaṁ bhagavantameva passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṁ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:642_0: “So ahaṁ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṁ purā puraṁ;
atk-s0201a1:644_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:644_1: “Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati,
atk-s0201a1:645_5: tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṁ ñātako”ti vandati,
atk-s0201a1:645_10: Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṁ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0201a1:649_0: Evaṁ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṁ “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṁ na bhijjati,
atk-s0201a1:649_3: so hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
atk-s0201a1:649_4: Tathā yaṁkiñci sippaṁ sikkhāpakaṁ titthiyaṁ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti evaṁ saraṇagamanappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a1:650_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:651_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṁ gato;
atk-s0201a1:655_0: Etaṁ kho saraṇaṁ khemaṁ, etaṁ saraṇamuttamaṁ;
atk-s0201a1:657_0: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṁsaphalaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:657_5: yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṁ niccato upagaccheyya,
atk-s0201a1:658_0: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0201a1:663_0: Aparampi vuttaṁ “atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno,
atk-s0201a1:663_2: ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca ‘sādhu kho devānaminda buddhaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ hoti,
atk-s0201a1:663_3: buddhaṁ saraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī’ti.
atk-s0201a1:663_4: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi
atk-s0201a1:664_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṁ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṁsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṁkilissati,
atk-s0201a1:664_4: Lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca.
atk-s0201a1:664_10: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññasatthāraṁ na uddisatīti evaṁ saraṇagamanassa saṁkileso ca bhedo ca veditabboti.
atk-s0201a1:664_11: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretūti maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṁ dhāretu,
atk-s0201a1:668_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci tisaraṇagato gahaṭṭho.
atk-s0201a1:668_2: “yato kho mahānāma upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti,
atk-s0201a1:669_1: So hi buddhaṁ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:670_1: Yathāha “yato kho mahānāma upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti adinnādānā,
atk-s0201a1:670_4: Ettāvatā kho mahānāma upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:671_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṁ.
atk-s0201a1:672_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti,
atk-s0201a1:672_2: Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0201a1:672_4: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti.
atk-s0201a1:672_7: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0201a1:672_13: ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṁ pariyesati tattha ca pubbakāraṁ karotī”ti.
atk-s0201a1:673_0: Kāsampattīti yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca,
atk-s0201a1:673_2: Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā.
atk-s0201a1:673_5: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
atk-s0201a1:674_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṁ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati.
atk-s0201a1:674_3: āvarāmi dvāraṁ nigaṇṭhānaṁ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0201a1:674_9: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0201a1:675_3: Anaññasatthukaṁ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṁ gataṁ upāsakaṁ kappiyakārakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu jānātu.
atk-s0201a1:675_4: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṁ chindeyya,
atk-s0201a1:675_5: neva buddhaṁ “na buddho”ti vā dhammaṁ “na dhammo”ti vā,
atk-s0201a1:675_7: Evaṁ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṁ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-s0201a1:680_5: Tasmā ito paraṁ ettakampi avatvā apubbapadavaṇṇanaṁyeva karissāma.
atk-s0201a1:681_2: Ettāvatā ca puggalavādī mahātheroti na gahetabbaṁ,
atk-s0201a1:681_4: so buddhassa bhagavato desanaṁ avilomentoyeva deseti.
atk-s0201a1:683_2: Tattha puggalo satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māroti evarūpā sammutidesanā.
atk-s0201a1:683_4: khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānāti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
atk-s0201a1:684_0: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṁ sutvā atthaṁ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṁ pahāya visesaṁ adhigantuṁ samatthā,
atk-s0201a1:684_2: Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṁ sutvā atthaṁ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṁ pahāya visesamadhigantuṁ samatthā,
atk-s0201a1:684_5: yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ atthasaṁvaṇṇanako ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṁ jānanti,
atk-s0201a1:684_9: Evaṁ te māṇavakā chekaṁ byattaṁ ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṁ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a1:684_11: Tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāvena ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni.
atk-s0201a1:684_14: Ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṁ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a1:691_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṁ katheti –
atk-s0201a1:691_9: “Khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti,
atk-s0201a1:691_11: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṁ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a1:691_12: “Itthī hirīyati ottappati puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti,
atk-s0201a1:692_0: “Khandhā kammassakā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a1:693_0: “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a1:694_0: “Khandhā mātaraṁ jīvitā voropenti pitaraṁ arahantaṁ ruhiruppādakammaṁ karonti,
